alert.note: Alert for Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Clusters of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola County through 600 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Caro, moving east at 15 mph, as well as another cluster east of Zilwaukee moving east at 15mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kingston around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include East Dayton, Deford, Tuscola, Colling, Wilmot, Colwood, Ellington, Gilford, Watrousville and Richville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
